attributes.action: Make June 21st a National Bank Holiday to mark the freedom of this Pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
We know how much this pandemic has affected millions. Loved ones were lost, NHS and Key workers did their job. We are now finally seeing the light at the end of the tunnel thanks to the great job by everyone staying at HOME and complying with UK’s restrictions. Mental health is at an all time low in this country.  Making June 21st a Bank Holiday will allow everyone to enjoy themselves the right way, it’s only RIGHT that people have work off on this day. 

Make June 21st 2021 a Bank Holiday.
attributes.background: For The UK government to create a National Bank Holiday for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland on June 21st 2020 or the day that all restrictions are lifted . To allow EVERYONE to celebrate this moment of History.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
